timeline.bodyText: why not? Can you mention it.

replies.bodyText:
sure - I'll update the comment. restartNucleusOnNucleusConfig throws a validation exception. The components are expected to throw an exception if it is invalid which then stops the configuration from being applied.
If the first component's config is ok, and it needs to restart, then it would stop other components from even looking at it
replies.author: rbattle
